title: My Style!
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Kukkuku!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Ku...... Kukku......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Hey~ That’s not it! You’re still blushing. To do this properly, you need to be confident!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>S-Sorry......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Well, umm..... It’s okay if you can’t do it. We’re different types of people, after all.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>No, I want to learn how other school idols act. Kasumi-san has been teaching me cute poses, but there’s still a lot that I’ve yet to grasp. The more I experience, the more likely I’ll be able to find my own style!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>If you say so, then I’ll continue...... But I do understand what you mean. It’s important to have your own style; it boosts your confidence.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yo-...... Yohane-san, please continue! I’ll do my best this time!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Okay, then! My followers from the dark abysses, rise! Gather under my dark wings!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>My followers from the dark abysses, rise! Gather under my dark wings~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
